description:
The Buff Original EcoStretch Neckwear Jay Live More Now is a multifunctional accessory that can be worn in more than 12 different ways. It is made of recycled polyester and spandex, which are eco-friendly and flexible materials.

  • It has a sun protection factor of UPF 50, which protects the skin from harmful UV rays
  • It is a special edition for the Live More Now campaign, which is a celebration of outdoor adventures and connection with nature
  • It features a black design with the words “Live More Now” and a mountain silhouette
name: Buff Original EcoStretch Neckwear Jay Live More Now - Unisex
